    • Method Detail

      • scoreboard

        public org.bukkit.scoreboard.Scoreboard scoreboard()
        Returns:
        The Minecraft scoreboard the teams will use.

      • bannerShapeWriteLetter

        public boolean bannerShapeWriteLetter()
        Returns:
        true if the first meaningful letter of the team name should be written on the default team banners.

      • bannerShapeAddBorder

        public boolean bannerShapeAddBorder()
        Returns:
        true if a border should be added to the default team banners.

      • bannerAllowSpecialShapes

        public boolean bannerAllowSpecialShapes()
        Returns:
        true if “easter-egg” default banners with special shapes based on names are allowed.

      • teamsOptionsSeeFriendlyInvisibles

        public boolean teamsOptionsSeeFriendlyInvisibles()
        Returns:
        true if the players should see their invisible teammates.

      • teamsOptionsFriendlyFire

        public boolean teamsOptionsFriendlyFire()
        Returns:
        true if the PvP should be enabled between teammates.

      • teamsOptionsColorizeChat

        public boolean teamsOptionsColorizeChat()
        Returns:
        true if the pseudonyms in the chat should be colorized (by setting their display name including their team color).

      • teamsOptionsAllowDuplicatedNames

        public boolean teamsOptionsAllowDuplicatedNames()
        Returns:
        true if duplicated team names are allowed.

      • teamsGUIItemType

        public fr.zcraft.quartzlib.tools.items.ColorableMaterial teamsGUIItemType()
        Returns:
        The GUI item to use to represent teams.

      • teamsGUIGlowOnCurrentTeam

        public boolean teamsGUIGlowOnCurrentTeam()
        Returns:
        true if one's current team should glow on the GUIs.

      • maxPlayersPerTeam

        public int maxPlayersPerTeam()
        Returns:
        The maximal number of players per team. 0 means “no limit”.

      • teamChatLogInConsole

        public boolean teamChatLogInConsole()
        Returns:
        true if the teams' private chat should be logged into the console.

      • setScoreboard

        public QuartzTeamsSettings setScoreboard(org.bukkit.scoreboard.Scoreboard scoreboard)
        Sets the scoreboard to be used by the teams to be displayed and registered into Bukkit.

        If this is never set, or reset by setting the scoreboard to null, the main Bukkit scoreboard will be used.

        Parameters:
        scoreboard - The scoreboard to use.

      • setBannerOptions

        public QuartzTeamsSettings setBannerOptions(boolean bannerShapeWriteLetter,
                                            boolean bannerShapeAddBorder)
        Updates the settings followed to generate the default teams banners.

        All default banners will be regenerated when this method is called, according to the new settings.

        Parameters:
        bannerShapeWriteLetter - true if the first meaningful letter of the team name should be written on the default team banners. Default true.
        bannerShapeAddBorder - true if a border should be added to the default team banners. Default false.

      • setBannerOptions

        public QuartzTeamsSettings setBannerOptions(boolean bannerShapeWriteLetter,
                                            boolean bannerShapeAddBorder,
                                            boolean bannerAllowSpecialShapes)
        Updates the settings followed to generate the default teams banners.

        All default banners will be regenerated when this method is called, according to the new settings.

        Parameters:
        bannerShapeWriteLetter - true if the first meaningful letter of the team name should be written on the default team banners. Default true.
        bannerShapeAddBorder - true if a border should be added to the default team banners. Default false.
        bannerAllowSpecialShapes - true if “easter-egg” default banners with special shapes based on names are allowed. Default true.

      • setTeamsOptions

        public QuartzTeamsSettings setTeamsOptions(boolean teamsOptionsSeeFriendlyInvisibles,
                                           boolean teamsOptionsFriendlyFire,
                                           boolean teamsOptionsColorizeChat,
                                           boolean teamsOptionsAllowDuplicatedNames)
        Updates the teams options for all teams.

        All teams settings will be updated when this method is called.

        Parameters:
        teamsOptionsSeeFriendlyInvisibles - true if the players should see their invisible teammates. Default true.
        teamsOptionsFriendlyFire - true if the PvP should be enabled between teammates. Default true.
        teamsOptionsColorizeChat - true to colorize the players name in the chat (by setting their display name including their team color). Default true.
        teamsOptionsAllowDuplicatedNames - true to allow multiple teams with the same name to be registered. Default false.

      • setTeamsChatOptions

        public QuartzTeamsSettings setTeamsChatOptions(boolean teamChatLogInConsole)

      • setGUIOptions

        public QuartzTeamsSettings setGUIOptions(fr.zcraft.quartzlib.tools.items.ColorableMaterial teamsGUIItemType,
                                         boolean teamsGUIGlowOnCurrentTeam)
        Updates the GUI settings.

        All GUIs will be updated to follow these new settings when this method is called.

        Parameters:
        teamsGUIItemType - The item to use to represent teams on the GUIs. Default BANNER.
        teamsGUIGlowOnCurrentTeam - true to add glow on the player's current team. Default true.

      • setMaxPlayersPerTeam

        public QuartzTeamsSettings setMaxPlayersPerTeam(int maxPlayersPerTeam)
        Updates the maximal amount of players per team. If some teams overflow the new limit, players will not be kicked but new one will not be able to join.
        Parameters:
        maxPlayersPerTeam - The maximal number of players per team. 0 to remove the limit (default value).
